Content.Text:
<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Could you tell me
what kinds of animals you have on your farm?
I'd like to come visit sometime, if I may.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. ♪ Are you planning to go
anywhere special today?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
*yawn* My apologies. I woke up earlier than
usual today, so I'm feeling a bit sleepy.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Hello! Did you already greet the
animals on the mountain?
<PAGE>
If not, please go say hi to them. I think that
would make them very happy!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Geh! H-how?! When did you get here? Did
you teleport or something?!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello there. Can you believe it's noon already?
And I have so much to do today! It saddens me
when half a day's gone before you know it...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. What are you up to at this late
hour?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Considering the hour, you still seem full of pep.
You have the stamina of a raccoon dog!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Good evening. Have you
finished your work for the day yet?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning! It's a pleasure speaking with you
first thing in the morning. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Have you come
just to see me? Heh. I'm so happy right now! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
To show you just how much I love you, I'm
going to teach you a secret spell that'll keep you
energized all day. Ready? Come in closer...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>*whisper* *whisper* ...There. Got all that? My
father taught me this spell long ago. Let's keep it
a secret between you and me, okay?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. You look rather busy. Be
careful not to overwork, though! You wouldn't
want to make yourself sick.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, I was just thinking about you, and here you
are!
<PAGE>
You come see me right when I decide I want
nothing more than to see you. You must be
psychic! Either that, or we're just simpatico...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh. Hello, handsome. Going my way? ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh! I didn't think I'd see you today...but I've
never been happier to be wrong!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening. I'm glad I could talk with you
today, even if just for a moment. I hope I can
talk with you a bit more tomorrow.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Wh-whoa,
hey...you're not leaving already, are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'd like to talk with you more... Why don't you
stay here, just a little longer? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Are you ready for
some hard work today? Because I sure am! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Are you ready for
your good morning kiss? Because I sure am!
Now, don't be shy... ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Here's hoping you
have a highly productive day today! I know I
certainly plan to.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you finished your work? I've been lonely,
since I wasn't able to talk with you this morning.
But now all is right with the world! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You didn't talk to me at all this morning, you
know. I was so lonely!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...But now that your work is done, here you are!
You came right to me, didn't you? That's so
sweet... Thank you!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm relieved to see the animals looking so healthy
today as well. To say nothing of how healthy
and full of life you appear to be!
<PAGE>
I've been worried about you, since I wasn't able
to speak with you this morning. It's my duty as
your wife to keep an eye on you, after all!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You left me alone almost all day, you know.
That's so mean! You have no idea how lonely I've
been, and I won't forgive you until you kiss me!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Have you finished your work
for the day? If so, then I'd suggest spending
some time with me for a change!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>I've been lonely without you around, you know. I
want you to give me some attention and love
every now and again...at least at night!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you tired? Should I give you a
massage before you sleep?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Though...I only really know how to massage
animals. Will that work on humans as well?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The weather is so nice today. I'm certain the
animals will all be thrilled!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just another rainy day. It seems like a warm rain,
but I do still worry that the animals will get a
chill...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's awfully hot today, don't you think?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Most animals are sensitive to the heat, so we'll
need to keep a watchful eye on their health until
conditions improve.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A summer rain is a true blessing for any animals
suffering from the heat.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I worry about those poor souls near the water,
however. With the river and lake so swollen, they
could easily be washed away...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's certainly a lovely day, isn't it? Perfect
weather for a picnic with friends! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Aaaaaaa-CHOO! ...Sorry... When it gets rainy
this time of year, it gets cold. And when it gets
cold, I suffer...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sun may be out, but it sure isn't warming
the town very much.
<PAGE>
Sometimes, I wish I could just hibernate like the
bears do. Every year around this time, in fact...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Have you ever watched the snow? It's beautiful,
isn't it? I just love the way it falls...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
With a typhoon on the way, I can't help but
worry about the animals in the Safari, and on the
mountain. I sure hope they'll be okay!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hope the animals found their way someplace
safe. *sigh* I'm so worried about them...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You can't go out in this weather! I know it's
frustrating, but I think we should just spend
some time at home today. It's much safer.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The snow's really coming down, isn't it? I can't
help but worry about the animals, though I know
they're strong enough to handle this.
<PAGE>
Your best bet is to believe in the crops you've
grown and the animals you've raised, and trust
that they'll make it through this safe and sound!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hear you're dating someone now.
Congratulations!
<PAGE>
Heh. You look happy. Which makes me happy,
too. It's a win for everyone! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The food here certainly is scrumptious, isn't it?
Raeger might just make a good housewife yet!
<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If delicious food makes people happy, then
would that make this a happiness factory?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heh. I say yes! Yes, it would!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? What am I talking about? Heh, I'm just
chit-chatting. You can join me, if you'd like!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The other day, I caught a really big fish.
<PAGE>
It was so huge that everyone around me stopped
what they were doing to check it out.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Last time I came here, I tripped and wound up
breaking one of the products. So today, I made
a point of walking very slowly and deliberately.
<PAGE>
...But as soon as Mistel saw me walking like I
was on eggshells, he told me to stop acting so
weird.
<PAGE>
I can't imagine it looked THAT weird, though...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Some of the animals banded together earlier and
gave me a flower. They're just so very sweet! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Phew, walking around like this sure does make a
person thirsty...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Out for a walk? Well, that makes two of us! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I often give treats to the animals and play with
them, right in this very spot! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The air is so clean and pure here. It must be
great for farming! And for the animals -- they
seem quite content.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, depending on the field, different crops will
grow faster?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Guess it doesn't matter if you're a crop, an
animal or a person; you're going to be affected
by your environment, no matter what!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, I think you can always tell who's
tending a field. Their personality rubs off on the
crops. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Eda's farm is always so well-organized. And
wouldn't you know it, every one of her crops
grows perfectly! She's got the magic touch.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mushroom, mushroom! ♪ Oh, mush, mush,
mushity mushroom! ♪ Heh. Melanie taught me
that one.
<PAGE>
Seeing mushrooms just made it pop into my
head, and I couldn't fight the overwhelming urge
to sing it!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems the animals have taken quite an interest
in these fields!
<PAGE>
They seem very curious as to what kinds of
crops grow there and how they taste.
<PAGE>
...Of course, I told them not to eat anything out
of the field. I was very clear on that point!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What an amazing flower garden. Giorgio is quite
the consummate pro!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I told the animals not to walk over any farmland,
and they understand. So there's no need to
worry. You can grow as much as you want!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I enjoy just looking at this field.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And that field over there... I could just watch it
for hours! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Fritz really is a hard worker. He's already been
out watering his crops this morning!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>He didn't seem to notice that his watering can
had a hole in it, though.
<PAGE>
He kept on getting mad and shouting about how
his water was disappearing.
<PAGE>
I didn't stick around long enough to see the end
of the saga, but I'm hoping he eventually realized
what was happening!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never get bored watching the spinning of a
water wheel, but...well, I do get dizzy...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This field certainly is conveniently close to town.
Makes it easier to rent, I bet. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The animals tell me that the crops from Elise's
farm look positively delicious to them.
<PAGE>
And I can't help but agree! So I'm going to go
ask Elise if she'd be willing to share a few
sometime.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Before I came back to this town, I was worried
that it might have changed too much since last
time...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But really, it hasn't changed a bit! The people
here are just as kind and open-armed as ever! I'm
really glad to have come back.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Make sure you don't bring any animals into the
town. What if someone is allergic? That would
be terrible!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since there are no lions or cheetahs in this
town, it's...a lot calmer and more peaceful than
it would be if there were, that's for sure!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The more time I'm able to spend with animals,
the happier I become.
<PAGE>
I've been working with animals for a long time,
and I've never once gotten tired of it. It's
rewarding every single time.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
D'oh... I went to the clinic and Angela scolded
me because I got all scratched up again...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My parents are researching a particular breed of
animal that's native to a whole other area, so
they really can't visit me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But the people in this town all treat me like I'm
part of their family, so I don't feel lonely at all!
♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyone who likes animals can't be bad. And I
can tell if a person REALLY likes animals just by
watching how he or she touches them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heh. Don't worry! You're safe. You're very gentle
with the animals.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What makes me interested in animals?
<PAGE>
Well, when I was little and traveling with my
parents, I saw some gnus migrating, and that
just really wowed me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I can still picture it in my head as clearly as if it
happened yesterday! I hope you're able to see it
someday too. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Thank you for always being so very nice to me. I
really like you, <MYNAME>. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I hope we can be good friends like this forever!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You've been rather distant with me lately. If you
keep this up, I'm going to sulk...and you
wouldn't like me when I sulk!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Did I...do something to make you dislike me...?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've been so happy every day since becoming
your girlfriend. <RED>∀</RED> I love you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Angela and Lillie said I should let them know if
you ever make me cry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heh. Their worries are unfounded, though! When
I'm with you, I can't help but smile. I'd never cry!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If that ever changes, though, and you DO make
me cry, those two will be your worst nightmare.
So you'd best be careful, all right?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
These days, when I'm watching the animals, I
can immediately tell who likes whom!
<PAGE>
And I owe that all to you, <MYNAME>. You
taught me what love is. And I can never thank
you enough for that. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, <MYNAME>, you're not just open-
hearted, you're also handsome. You're basically
my ideal man! Heh. I love you so much! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>I've got a problem. I love you so, so much, and I
want to express to you just how deeply I care
about you, but...
<PAGE>
...well, even if I say the words every day, it's just
not enough! What should I do? How do I convey
my passion to you? It's eating me up!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Go away, <MYNAME>! You don't mean a thing
to me anymore!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You're so cold to me these days...
<PAGE>
This is not how a married couple should be. You
need to pay more attention to your
relationship...to me!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Your affection toward me used to be palpable. I
could FEEL it. But now...I don't feel a thing...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My lifestyle was completely dependent on
animals before, but that all changed after I
married you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Now, I have to make time for my precious
husband too, because you're just as precious to
me as any animal!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I have to admit, while I do enjoy taking care of
the animals and studying them...I also really
enjoy doing housework for you! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ever since we got married, I feel less inclined to
study the animals, and more inclined to study
you...
<PAGE>
I do so love when I learn something new. Your
likes and dislikes, or what kinds of faces you
make in what kinds of situations...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><MYNAME>, I love you, you know! <RED>∀</RED> I love
being with you every day. It's my greatest joy!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never expected I'd be in a relationship with you
one day. I feel like I'm having a beautiful dream...
Let's make lots of memories together! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The time I've spent with you is my greatest
treasure. Thank you for giving me such lovely
memories.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy to be your girlfriend again. We
should be together as much as possible, to
make up for lost time! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Won't be long now till we're married, will it? I
can't tell you how much I'm looking forward to
our wedding day! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You were so handsome at the wedding... I think
I've fallen in love with you even more than
before! How is that even possible? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's exciting just thinking about having a child.
What kind of little person will our baby be? I
can't wait to find out! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Seems our baby can hear us even from inside
my belly. When I speak to it, I can feel it move.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Won't be long now until our little bundle of joy
makes its grand debut, huh? I'm as ready to do
this as I'll ever be, as long as you're by my side!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our babies are so tiny and cute! Let's raise them
with all our love!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've been watching our babies crawl around
since this morning, and decided to crawl right
after them! ♪ 
<PAGE>
Would you like to join us too? It's fun!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Being a parent is not an easy job, but just seeing
our children grow day by day makes it all
worthwhile, don't you think?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Yay, <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! Man, I love these
so much, I could eat them every day! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Thank you so very much, <MYNAME>! You've
made me very happy!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, these are wonderful. Thank you very much!
♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, I am definitely a fan of these. Thank you
very much! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Thank you very much!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Erm... I don't much care for this...but I can't
very well turn down a gift from you, now, can I?
So...thank you! I greatly appreciate the thought.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Th-this is...something I quite despise...
I'd really rather you not give me another one of
these ever again, if I may be frank...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Oh...it's a hot, spicy <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>. I
appreciate the thought and all, but I'm no good
with hot, spicy things...
<PAGE>
...Oh, but I can add sugar and ice! Then...it
might not be so bad. I'll give it a try! Thanks.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, look at how it sparkles! It's so nice to
receive such a high-class gift from you. I'll take
good care of it, I promise! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, look at it twinkle! ...What? It's for me?!
Well, thank you very much! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)
Let's not give her a present right now.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, but my bag is full right now, so I'll
have to take a rain check on that. I appreciate
the thought, though!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't need presents. I just want more time to
talk with you.
<PAGE>
It's been a long time since we last took the time
to have a proper conversation, and I must admit,
it's made me feel very lonely...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
We haven't talked for a loooooong time, you
know. And now here you are, bearing me gifts?
<PAGE>
What I need isn't material goods, <MYNAME>. I
just want some time to talk to you! That means
more to me than any present!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? A present again? I think I need to cut you
off! But I really do appreciate the thought.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since you've already given me a present, please,
take what you were going to give me and keep
it. That will please me most. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've already received a gift...and I'd feel bad
taking so much. So I'm afraid I'll have to turn
this one away.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I appreciate the thought very much. Thank
you, <MYNAME>! I love you, you know! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Yay, <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! Man, I love these
so much! ♪
<PAGE>
I didn't expect to receive such a nice present for
my birthday. Thank you so very much,
<MYNAME>! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you knew just what to give me for my
birthday! That's so sweet!
<PAGE>
Thank you very much! I'll make sure to enjoy
this! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, now, you're quite good at picking out gifts,
it would seem! Thank you so much. You're very
kind! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is that a birthday present for me? How touching!
Thank you so much! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Erm... Well, it's clear you remembered my
birthday, so let's just focus on that. Thank you!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Do you hate me? Is that why you're giving
me...THIS...for my birthday...?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> for my birthday? What
a sad birthday this has turned out to be...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, it's shining so beautifully! Just looking at
it has me excited. This truly is the perfect
birthday present!
<PAGE>
Thank you so much for preparing something so
rare and exquisite for me! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is it...really okay for me to have something so
rare and valuable? ...What? It's a birthday
present?!
<PAGE>
Wow. Well, you certainly have outdone yourself!
Thank you so very much for your kindness. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, hello, little bunny! Are your ears in tip-top
shape today as well? If you need me to clean
them, just say the word! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, your tail got a bit dirty, didn't it? Let's make
you an appointment for a shampooing, shall
we?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, have you two gotten to know one another?
My dear ermine, I'm so happy that you have a
new friend! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Sifaka, you look marvelous today! We're still on
for that play-date later, right? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, Penguin! You left some of your food
today, didn't you? Tsk, tsk! You won't grow big
and strong if you don't eat your meals!
<PAGE>
...Did you get a treat from someone, by any
chance? You mustn't skip meals in favor of
treats!
<PAGE>
And people mustn't encourage such behavior...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh. How are you, my monkey friend? You look
as cute as ever today. I like your beady little
eyes! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh. This parrot is looking at me like it's saying,
"Fine, if you REALLY WANT TO HUG ME, I guess
I won't say no!"
<PAGE>
This little fellow isn't very good at expressing
